column4: lol i had problems doing that a few times trirnoth1  and i just let it do what it wanted
Did it end up using all of the space? My Outer Container is an 80GB partition, I was hoping the Inner Container would only be a few GB but can handle up to maybe 40.
Using a blank drive but thanks for the warning.
I thought about creating a bunch of empty files to take up some of the space before creating the Hidden Container then deleting when completed, but seemed like a lot of time to do this.
